availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Stephen May Murphy (Nelson County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of F. G. Murphy and Mary E. Murphy. Married to Mary M. McMeekin Murphy in Nelson County, Kentucky, on January 24, 1854. Father of William W. Murphy, Belle Murphy, and John Q. Murphy. Merchant in Nelson County in 1850. Household owned sixteen enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1850. Retired merchant in Nelson County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in guardianship for an under-age brother-in-law, Lawrence McMeekin, in 1860.
